key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to data security and privacy laws
Intense competition from established players like Square and PayPal
Dependence on small-to-medium-sized businesses (SMBs) vulnerable to economic downturns
Operational dependencies on financial institutions and technology providers
controversies: Recent stock downgrades by Keefe Bruyette and The Benchmark Company
Potential challenges in cryptocurrency payment integration due to regulatory scrutiny
social_issues: Focus on financial inclusion through SMBs and digital transformation
Integration of cryptocurrency donations through The Giving Block for social impact
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance in international markets and varying payment infrastructure standards
